alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 10:55PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Poinsett, western Mississippi, northeastern Crittenden, central Tipton and southwestern Lauderdale Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1055 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keiser, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Osceola, Lepanto, Luxora, Wilson, Keiser, Fort Pillow State Park, Munford, Brighton, Joiner, Dyess, Dell, Sunset, Burdette, Gilmore, Bassett, Jericho, Marie, Fulton and Dixonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
